document.full_text: college football quarterback nate montana, son of nfl hall of fame star joe montana, was arrested early on friday in missoula, montana, on suspicion of driving under the influence.
document.title: nfl great joe montana's son charged with drunken driving
lines_and_colors: college football quarterback nate montana, son of nfl hall of fame star joe montana, was arrested early on friday in missoula, montana, on suspicion of driving under the influence.
